name: Thear's Salvation
description: A 2D adventure platformer with pixel art aesthetics which has as a core concept the 4 elements - water, earth, fire, air. You are a brave character on a mission to save the world by using elemental swords to fight corrupt bandits who abuse the resources of the planet and elemental creatures who are ordinary people possessed by an elemental spirit. Your goal is to free the planet from the bandits’ doom and calm the spirits of nature by releasing them from the elemental creatures.
